2064.subject: HPWE
2064.descrlong: Discusses health from the perspective of each student's ancestral and cultural heritage.  Students share experiences/ reflections of their individual culture tradition or lack thereof and track recent family health history, ancestral histories and health and healing practices of their family/ cultural heritage.  Explores creation and origin stories and deepens the relationship to place, the histories of our families, and the indigenous people of the land on which we live or came from.
